newsitem.title: GERMANY: Mercedes says resumes Spanish production.
newsitem.headline: Mercedes says resumes Spanish production.

text.p: German carmaker Mercedes-Benz AG said on Thursday that it had resumed production at two Spanish factories after truck drivers in Spain said on Wednesday they would end their strike.
"The production lines in Spain are running again," a Mercedes spokesman said.
Mercedes said production of about 1,000 of its V-Class transporters was affected by the week-long stoppage in production at a plant in Vitoria and also at a parts production plant in Barcelona.
